mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Calendars (cal_idx, user_idx, title, description, start, end, allday, location, reminder, background_color) VALUES (#{calIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allDay}, #{location}, #{reminder}, #{backgroundColor})
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_idx AS scheduleIdx, cal_idx AS calIdx, user_idx AS userIdx, title, description, start, end, allday location, reminder, background_color AS backgroundColor FROM Calendars WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx}
